verses.verse: Answer <WH6030> me when I call, <WH7121> God <WH430> of my righteousness. <WH6664> Give me relief <WH7337> from my distress. <WH6862> Have mercy <WH2603> on me, <WH8085> and hear my prayer. <WH8605>

You sons <WH1121> of men, <WH376> how long <WH5704> shall my glory <WH3519> be turned into dishonor? <WH3639> Will you love <WH157> vanity, <WH7385> and seek <WH1245> after falsehood? <WH3577> Selah. <WH5542>
But know <WH3045> that Yahweh <WH3068> has set apart <WH6395> for himself him who is godly: <WH2623> Yahweh <WH3068> will hear <WH8085> when I call to him. <WH7121>
Stand in awe, <WH7264> and don't <WH2398> sin. Search <WH559> your own heart <WH3824> on your bed, <WH4904> and be still. <WH1826> Selah. <WH5542>
Offer <WH2076> the sacrifices <WH2077> of righteousness. <WH6664> Put your trust <WH982> in Yahweh. <WH3068>
Many <WH7227> say, <WH559> "Who will show <WH7200> us any good? <WH2896>" Yahweh, <WH3068> let the light <WH216> of your face <WH6440> shine on us. <WH216>
You have put <WH5414> gladness <WH8057> in my heart, <WH3820> more than when <WH6256> their grain <WH1715> and their new wine <WH8492> are increased. <WH7231>
In peace <WH7965> I will both <WH3162> lay myself down <WH7901> and sleep, <WH3462> for you, <WH3068> Yahweh alone, <WH910> make me live <WH3427> in safety. <WH983>
